content: KH-EZ C Countersunk screw anchor Ultimate screw anchor for quicker and more economical fastenings to concrete (carbon steel, countersunk head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Countersunk head allows for a flush finish Time and labor-saving concrete screw anchor – especially suited for seismic, cracked concrete and grout filled CMU applications requiring an ICC approval Quicker and easier to install than wedge anchors – no cleaning, no high-accuracy torque wrench and no hammering required Optimized thread design for exceptional setting performance, superior load values and reduced edge distances and spacing Fully removable anchoring solution for use with standard ANSI-tolerance drill bits – no special tolerance drill bits required for these screw anchors Applications Fastening handrails, railings and other ornamental steelwork Architectural steel plates Piping or ventilation applications Anchoring glass shoes and door thresholds ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Countersunk Torx Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Miami Dade County, Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Countersunk Torx | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Miami Dade County, Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | Yes | IBC compliance | IBC 2018 | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 8 µm) ### ITEMS- 2265701 - Screw anchor KH-EZ C 1/4x2 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KH-EZ C 1/4x2 Screw - 3675754 - KH-EZ C 1/4x2 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1600x KH-EZ C 1/4x2 Screw - 2265702 - Screw anchor KH-EZ C 1/4x2-1/2 -
